mapper.insert: insert into Test_BOARD(Test_BNO, Test_TITLE, Test_CONTENT, Test_WRITER) values(Test_BOARD_sq.nextval, #{Test_TITLE}, #{Test_CONTENT}, #{Test_WRITER})
mapper.select: select Test_BNO, Test_TITLE, Test_CONTENT, Test_WRITER, Test_hit, REGDATE from Test_BOARD order by Test_BNO desc
select Test_BNO, Test_TITLE, Test_CONTENT, Test_WRITER, Test_hit, REGDATE from Test_BOARD where Test_BNO=#{Test_BNO}
mapper.update: update Test_BOARD set Test_hit=Test_hit+1 where Test_BNO=#{Test_BNO}
